greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers which maps between the partitions as encoded in A112798 (prime-index based system, one-based) to A227739 (binary based system, zero-based).
comment: Note the indexing: the domain starts from one, but the range also includes zero.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1024
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(n) = A075158(A241909(n)-1). [With A075158's original starting offset].
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 05 2014
